Lab 8: Mancala Part Deux

Posted on November 24, 2014

A reference solution for lab 7 has been posted here.

The task for this lab is to:

  • Write IO to allow two players to play the game
  • write a README explaining your implementation and two player game

The IO should begin with a command:

$ ./playMancala

which can be compiled from a playMancala.hs file. The game should alternate between the two players and allow them to play a full game. There should be a prompt for players to move and in between moves the program should pretty-print the board state. The game should halt when one player wins.
